column5: Have the Port Hope/Ganaraska river started their salmon run yet?  Have not seen any reports about them yet.  Thanks!
well i made apost last night about the tribs in the eastern gta....oh ya maybe you should intoduce yourself first
I wuzz wunderin' the same t'ing, t'uther day so I put $25.00 gas in the van and took a cruise down & checked!

hey i'm really excited about the salmon making there run upstream but it hasn't rained hard lately n me n my dad i going up to port hope b4 it closes i was wondering if u knew if some sum have been making the run?
